repairedDockerfile:
FROM centurylink/ruby-base:2.1.2 
RUN apt-get update && \
 DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y libcurl4-openssl-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD . /tmp 
WORKDIR /tmp 
RUN bundle install --without development 

CMD sleep 5 && rake socialize:pull_and_save && QUEUE=etl rake resque:work
